title: Out of Order
author: verias
text:
Apparently being a hormonal teenager, you sometimes forget that there is an order to the way things should be done.

At least the girls are starting to get back on track, though, right?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: For some reason I'm picturing the next night. Mandrake floating outside Chrys's door pictographing complaints about the noise and Melody saying something like "About time!"

replies.author: Peaches*Guest*
replies.text: What about Tinkles?!?  He's just standing there burning away and nobody cares?
